Rather than savage cuts, Switzerland considers “Star Trek” economics "By gathering over 100,000 signatures activists have secured a vote by Switzerland’s parliament on an audacious proposal: providing a basic monthly income of about $2,800 U.S. dollars to each adult in the country"
